body: CANDIDATUL IDEAL:University degree - economic background; • Fluent in Russian and English; • 1 year work experience in accounting; • Must be a friendly individual, a good team player and able to communicate easily with Accenture, Client and third parties staff at all levels; • Attention to details; • Ability to solve urgent matters and work under pressure;  • Reliable, proactive approach to entrusted tasks. RESPONSABILITATI / BENEFICII:Process accounts payable invoices and travel expenses; • Process invoices and resolve customer related situations as per accounts receivable procedures • Process internal accounting documents (corrections, reclassifications etc.); • Controlling the booking of the documents processed in order to assure the accuracy;  • Update processes and procedures; • Develops good client relationships; • Subject to regular local supervision of progress against results.WE OFFER: •The opportunity to boost your career within one of the world´s leading global companies; •Professional growth based on performance; •Training program/curriculum; •Competitive salary and Wide range of benefits  Interviu Online:1.  Please rate your Russian skills, on a scale from 0 to 3 where 0= N/A; 1= Basic; 2= Conversational; 3= Fluent.2.  What are your salary expectations for this position?
title: Accounting Officer with Russian
